Title: Enacts the Kelsey Smith Act to require wireless service providers to provide call location information to law enforcement during an emergency
Summary: Enacts the Kelsey Smith Act to require wireless service providers to provide call location information to law enforcement during an emergency.
LawCode: Add ยง399-jj, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to enacting the "Kelsey Smith Act" requiring wireless service providers to provide call location information to law enforcement during an emergency
